title: Knowledge Graph Representation with Jointly Structural and Textual Encoding

questions.question: What neural models are used to encode the text?
evidence: In this paper, we use three encoders (NBOW, LSTM and attentive LSTM) to model the text descriptions.
highlighted_evidence: In this paper, we use three encoders (NBOW, LSTM and attentive LSTM) to model the text descriptions.
